inra.ijpb.geometry

Class AngleDiameterPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • inra.ijpb.geometry.AngleDiameterPair

  • public class AngleDiameterPair
extends java.lang.Object
    Data structure used to return result of Feret diameters computation. Can be used to return the result of minimum or maximum diameters computation.
    Author:
    dlegland

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double angle
      Angle in radians
      double diameter
      Diameter computed in the direction of the angle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AngleDiameterPair(double angle, double diameter)
      Default constructor, using angle in degrees and diameter.

      • AngleDiameterPair

        public AngleDiameterPair(double angle,
                         double diameter)

        Parameters:
        angle - the orientation angle, in degrees
        diameter - the diameter along the direction
